# [v18.0.0-alpha](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531)

- `packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js`
  - createSubscription
    - [supports basic subscription pattern](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531/packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js#L48)
    - [should support observable types like RxJS ReplaySubject](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531/packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js#L80)
    - Promises
      - [should support Promises](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531/packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js#L115)
      - [should still work if unsubscription is managed incorrectly](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531/packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js#L162)
      - [should not call setState for a Promise that resolves after unmount](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531/packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js#L196)
    - [should unsubscribe from old subscribables and subscribe to new subscribables when props change](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531/packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js#L232)
    - [should ignore values emitted by a new subscribable until the commit phase](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531/packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js#L271)
    - [should not drop values emitted between updates](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531/packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js#L364)
    - warnings
      - [should warn for invalid missing getCurrentValue](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531/packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js#L463)
      - [should warn for invalid missing subscribe](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531/packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js#L476)
      - [should warn if subscribe does not return an unsubscribe method](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/e6be2d531/packages/create-subscription/src/__tests__/createSubscription-test.js#L489)
